title: The World of David the Gnome
creator_credit: Ernest Reid, Ronald A Weinberg, Micheline Charest, Miramax Films and Cinar Films
brief_description: A series of videos each containing two adventures of David the Gnome, his wife Lisa and faithful fox, Swift, narrated by Christopher Plummer and animated for the screen from the stories of Rien Poortvliet and Wil Huygen.
creator_credit_for_label: Ernest Reid, Ronald A Weinberg, Micheline Charest, Miramax Films and Cinar Films
